alert.note: Alert for Bexar; Guadalupe (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 2:50PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Guadalupe and southeastern Bexar Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 249 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cibolo, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... San Antonio, Schertz, Cibolo, Universal City, Live Oak, Selma, Randolph AFB, Kirby, St. Hedwig, Elmendorf, China Grove, Marion, Santa Clara, New Berlin, Zuehl, Calaveras Lake, Converse, Martinez, Parita and Sayers. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
